title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.96 - Edgecombe Residential Treatment Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.96 - Edgecombe Residential Treatment Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
in the department a facility to be known as Edgecombe Residential Treatment

Facility, which shall be located in the borough of Manhattan, City and State of

New York, and which shall consist of the property under the jurisdiction of the
department on the land and building at 611 Edgecombe Avenue, New York, NY
10032. (b) Edgecombe Residential

Treatment Facility shall be classified as a minimum security correctional
facility for offenders 18 years of age or older to be used for the following
purposes: (1)
general confinement facility
for males; (2)
residential
treatment facility for males; and
(3)
work release and residential treatment
facility for females. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.96

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
